name: UniBall
description: One of the longest running independent games on the Internet, UniBall has evolved from a simple version of space hockey into an online multiplayer e-sport that is uniquely its own.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: x86 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: N/A DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 180 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core Graphics: N/A DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
